The disk collides elastically with a uniform rod of length <math alttext="l" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mo>ℓ</mo></mstyle></math> that is at rest and free to pivot about one end, as shown in Figure 1 above.
